channel.title: Investment Strategy on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in Investment Strategy on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: Beyond Globalization: Investing in the Decade of the Re-Wired Supply Chain
item.description: An in-depth analysis of the investment opportunities arising from the global supply chain rewiring, driven by geopolitical shifts and industrial policies like the CHIPS Act and IRA.

item.title: Wall Street's Tug-of-War: Can a Corporate Earnings Boom Withstand the Geopolitical Storm?
item.description: An analysis of the conflict between strong Q3 2025 corporate earnings and escalating U.S.-China trade tensions, exploring the potential impact on global markets and the role of central banks.
